message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.RO, cs.GT, cs.SY

The paper discusses models of intrinsic motivation in video games, which is a topic that falls under the category of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper proposes a modified UCT tree search method to mitigate the computational complexity of empowerment maximization, which is a machine learning technique, and therefore falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the evaluation of the approach in a Minecraft-like scenario, which involves robotics and control (cs.RO) and game theory (cs.GT). Finally, the paper proposes modifications to facilitate better sampling, which is a topic that falls under the category of systems and control (cs.SY).
